page.title: 10The Brownlow Arms
page.content: One of the two pubs in{Faldingworth is called{The Brownlow Arms.}It is a free house but it mainly relies on Mc Ewan's Younger beers.{The Brownlow {Arms}got its name from Earl Brownlow it was built in the 1830's. Before it was a pub it was a rent house. Mr.and Mrs.Miller used to run{The Brownlow {Arms.}In September 1985 they sold it to Mr.Hicks and his daughter Sandie Hicks. In{The Brownlow Arms}there are two pool tables, space invaders, darts, and they some times have a domino championships and it also has swings and a carpark. Mr. and Mrs. Philipson owned{The {Brownlow Arms}in the 1930's. Then they also brewed their own ale. You can get meals in the lounge when the pub is open you can also reserve a table, and they have rooms to stay the night.
